snippet.title: Ever 17 - Crossover Impression
snippet.description:
One of my favourites, this video mostly based on the visual novel, named Ever 17 - The out of infinity. These characters takes place in these novels from the series, made by KID, published by Hirameki International Group inc.

High Quality recommended =P

I hope you all enjoy the video. Sry for my english if it is that bad :P

Please rate it, blaa blaa blaaa... ^^'
